title: The new 'made in SCM automation' on stage at Ligna 2023 - Furniture Production Magazine
summary: SCM, a woodworking machinery manufacturer, is showcasing its Smart&Human Factory at Ligna, a trade fair in Hannover. The factory features automated production cells that combine robotics with human interaction to optimize efficiency and sustainability. SCM is also presenting a range of new products and technologies, including a laser unit for surface treatment, a compact spraying system, and a five-axis CNC machining center for timber construction.

title: HARMAN opens new Automotive Engineering Centre in Chennai - FoneArena
summary: HARMAN, a subsidiary of Samsung Electronics, has opened a new Automotive Engineering Center in Chennai, India. This new center, which will be operational by the second quarter of 2023, will focus on developing advanced automotive technologies and tap into Chennai's strong pool of engineering talent. The center features eco-friendly design elements, including energy-saving technology, eco-friendly furniture, and EV charging stations.
